testsuite.name: Scenario: TC 3.6 - Delete a Recipe, error path - delete an empty recipe

testcase.name: Given an empty recipe book
testcase.classname: Scenario: TC 3.6 - Delete a Recipe, error path - delete an empty recipe

testcase.name: And the coffee maker is in waiting state
testcase.classname: Scenario: TC 3.6 - Delete a Recipe, error path - delete an empty recipe

testcase.name: And the user has selected delete a recipe
testcase.classname: Scenario: TC 3.6 - Delete a Recipe, error path - delete an empty recipe

testcase.name: Then the user cannot delete the recipe if they enter a recipe number that is not valid "1"
testcase.classname: Scenario: TC 3.6 - Delete a Recipe, error path - delete an empty recipe

testcase.name: And the coffee maker transitions into "WAITING" mode
testcase.classname: Scenario: TC 3.6 - Delete a Recipe, error path - delete an empty recipe

testcase.name: And the current status of the coffee maker is "OUT_OF_RANGE"
testcase.classname: Scenario: TC 3.6 - Delete a Recipe, error path - delete an empty recipe
